desc: I want to create specific poses using the "POSER 11" programs by Smith Micro Software.I am a Martial Arts Master and I think that the graphic program called Poser 11 really does a good job of demonstrating body posture and it can easily show you with the different camera views correct and incorrect body postures.  I want to use this as an instructional aide.For examplePose 1 "Standing at Attention Position",Pose 2 is "Feet one shoulder distance apart, toes forward, arms in front like a shield, fists in the center.I would show you a video of the a person performing then you would make the "Poser 11" graphic figure do the same movement.  It a sense it is instructional where the animation figure can demonstrate the proper posture.  There would also be a Pose 3 showing the wrong posture perhaps bent over.I would pay you to create these poses and make the short animation movement from one pose to the other.  The figure can be a standard issue "Ryan" that comes with the Poser program.This is a proof of concept project.  I really do need to find someone who can pose and animate figures in the program  "POSER 11"Best regards,Michael
title: I need YOU to be experienced at using graphic software "POSER 11" by Smith Micro Software, Inc.
